text: veetle dress with signal Machado a
verdict that was shocking and painful
too many people peter gresty mohamed
fahmy and bayer mohammed were given
prison sentences ranging between seven
and ten years with the new year comes an
appeal session that ushers in a gush of
hope for the three journalists and their
families we are confident that the
appeal will acknowledge the fact that
Peter and his colleagues have been
entirely wrongfully convicted and
sentenced and and jailed we are now
driving by the sprawling Tora prison
complex where the three journalists are
held security measures are very tight
here so we cannot film outside there are
hopes that the three men may walk out of
this notorious place sooner than
expected after a recent reconciliation
deal between Egypt and Qatar earlier
this month the Egyptian president met
with a Qatari m voy in Cairo Saudi
Arabia was the mediator
it appears to be that mediation efforts
wrote this lafayette amira mo aziz al
Jesse one of Qatar's and Jazeera
channels known for its criticism of the

down Qatar is softening its toll Egypt
may also make some changes muhammad
fahim his family are cautiously
optimistic it's mixed feeling hope and
fear feared because when we imagine
about this seven years which cannot be
because his innocent men so why we keep
thinking of seven years we are dreaming
that we can get Mohamed with us the next
year it was a very tough and hard year
on me and on his parents and definitely
